short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An excellent new tab extension for your browser with Veterans related images

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An excellent new tab extension for your Chrome browser with a US Army Tab theme.

Make a great American soldiers or army-related image for the new tabs' background! Additionally, the extension offers users a Custom Web Search in the New Tab.

You accept the EULA and Privacy Policy and agree to select Veteran US Tab as your new tab page by installing the "Veteran US Tab" extension.

Yahoo will offer the search tools that will be used in the plugin. However, your browser's default search settings won't alter due to the extension
